meta.title: Migrate from Vert.x 3 to Vert.x 4
meta.summary: We provide a clear and well-documented migration path from Vert.x 3.9 to Vert.x 4. Existing users will feel at home with the new version.

meta.title: JWT Authorization for Vert.x with Keycloak
meta.summary: In this blog post, you'll learn about JWT foundations, protect routes with JWT Authorization, JWT encoded tokens, and RBAC with Keycloak

meta.title: Easy SSO for Vert.x with Keycloak
meta.summary: In this blog post, you'll learn how to implement Single Sign-on with OpenID Connect and how to use Keycloak together with Eclipse Vert.x.

meta.title: Send web requests and assert results with vertx-junit5-web-client
meta.summary: In this blog post, you'll learn how to use the new vertx-junit5-web-client module to send web requests in your unit tests and to make assertions.

meta.title: Vert.x Web API Service Introduction
meta.summary: This blog post teaches you how to use the new module vertx-web-api-service to combine the Web Router and the OpenAPI Router Factory with service proxies.

meta.title: HTTP response validation with the Vert.x Web Client
meta.summary: Learn how to use response predicates from the Vert.x Web module to validate HTTP responses and to automatically generate error messages.
